table.name: quest_partner_relative
table.comment: Stores relatives of Quest Students who are either alumni or current employees of a Quest Partner College.

field.name: contact_id
field.comment: Student whom this relative is linked to. FK to Contact ID

field.name: connection_type
field.comment: How is this relative connected to the Partner College?

field.name: partner_id
field.comment: Which partner college is she or he connected to? FK to quest_partner.

field.name: relationship
field.comment: How is this relative related to the student (unstructured text input)?

field.name: college_grad_year
field.comment: For relatives with connection_type = Alumnus - what year did they graduate?

field.name: department
field.comment: For relatives with connection_type of Employee - what college department are they in.
